entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
